PRIVACY POLICY

Pantheon is committed to protecting your privacy and developing technology that gives you the most powerful and safe online experience. This Statement of Privacy applies to the Odyssey Mobile Application and governs data collection and usage. By using the Odyssey Mobile Application, you consent to the data practices described in this statement.

This Statement of Privacy does not apply to the Odyssey server. The server may be maintained by Pantheon or a third-party. Pantheon encourages you to review the privacy statements of the Odyssey servers you connect to via the Odyssey Mobile Application.

Collection of your Personal Information

The Odyssey Mobile Application collects personally identifiable information, such as your Odyssey user name and server address.

Please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information or personally sensitive data through the Odyssey public message boards, this information may be collected and used by others. Note: Pantheon does not read any of your private online communications.

Pantheon encourages you to review the privacy statements of Web sites you choose to link to from Pantheon so that you can understand how those Web sites collect, use and share your information. Pantheon is not responsible for the privacy statements or other content on Web sites outside of the Odyssey Mobile Application.
